entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Turtle Mountain (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 p.m. CDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 16 April 2023
